summary: Wren is a Breton/Vampire Hybrid follower available in HDT & Non-HDT UUNP & CBBE body types; with and without armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][/font][/center][center][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=6][b]Wren[/b][/size][/color]

Based on thedoodlebob aka PillowFun's Character on their [url=http://pillowfun.tumblr.com/]Tumblr[/url] & [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/142802153@N06/]Flickr[/url] Account
Permission granted for follower creation by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6786683/?]thedoodlebob aka PillowFun

[/url][/font]*Now Part of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81551/?]thedoodlebob's Merged Follower Pack[/url]*[font=Verdana][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6786683/?]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/w0m9imj9j/what_of_it_28702054023_o.jpg[/img]

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6786683/?][img]https://s5.postimg.org/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
[/url]Name:  Wren
Race:  Breton/Vampire Hybrid
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  20
Body:  HDT & Non-HDT UUNP/CBBE
Skin:  Demoniac (2k & 4k options)
Armor:  Witcher 3 Yennefer DLC Option (doubled armor rating)

[i]*No Armor Versions she will be naked*
*Tattoo is currently only on the UUNP 2k Version*[/i]

Weapons:  Ebony Dagger & Her Hands
Location:  Whiterun - Hall of the Dead

Class:  Combat Mage Necro
Style:  Human Magic (think Serana)

Levels with player.
Skills bonuses/Perk trees:  Conjuration, Destruction, Restoration, Illusion, Sneak, Light Armor

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs Pictured:  SnapDragon, Vividan, & RealVision

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/yo74f8mx3/screenshot68711_29018700704_o.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.org/yfags2807/20161130230833_1.jpg[/img][/url][font=Verdana][url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]
[img]https://s5.postimg.org/70kof7h1j/Q&A.png[/img]
[/url]Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  Not without express permission from thedoodlebob aka PillowFun

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*?
A:  My apologies but this is not my character so I will not make changes to appearance.

Q:  What is the other armor pictured in some screenshots?
A:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25852/?]Lustmord Vampire Armor[/url]

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.
A:  I will probably refuse any little girl/boy looking follower requests though.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
